title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: The bug report addresses an issue related to switching perspectives in the software.
OB: When switching between different perspectives, the software fails to retain the maximized state of the view.
EB: The expected behavior is that when users switch between perspectives, the software should remember and maintain the maximized state of the view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Maximize the view by double-clicking the title bar.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
